Protocols/IconRenderer.html#/s:20AppIcon.name: renderPNG(sizeInPixels:)
Protocols/IconRenderer.html#/s:20AppIcon.abstract: Conform to this and render an icon. Give it to an AppIconSetGenerator to generate a full set

Classes/EmojiIconRenderer/Error.html#/s:.name: couldNotCreateBitmapImage
Classes/EmojiIconRenderer/Error.html#/s:.abstract: Creation of bitmap failed for some reason.

Classes/EmojiIconRenderer/Error.html#/s:.name: couldNotCreatePNGRepresentation
Classes/EmojiIconRenderer/Error.html#/s:.abstract: Rendering into PNG failed for some reason.

Classes/AppIconSetGenerator.html#/s:20Ap.name: createAppIconSet(in:)
Classes/AppIconSetGenerator.html#/s:20Ap.abstract: Create an app icon set. Any existing files AppIcon.appiconset at the given location will be overwritten.

Classes/AppIconSetGenerator.html.name: AppIconSetGenerator
Classes/AppIconSetGenerator.html.abstract: Use AppIconSetGenerator to generate a complete set of app icons, including the Contents.json
